sn2.20:1.1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:6.2: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn2.20:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn2.20:7.2: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn2.20:7.3: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, so devaputto mama santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:12.2: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
sn2.20:13.1: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn2.20:13.2: “so hi nūna, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
sn2.20:13.3: Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
sn2.20:13.4: “Sādhu sādhu, ānanda, yāvatakaṁ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṁ anuppattaṁ taṁ tayā.
